topics.body:
"Kotaro could run out of orange juice in the morning, and he'd blame it on Golgom, crush the box in his hand, then take off running down the street.

Meanwhile Bishium would be presenting her plan to deprive Japan of orange juice, leading to a breakdown of the economy, the fall of the government, widespread riots, and worldwide devastation. And Darom would think it was a FANTASTIC idea."

Part of why I love Kamen rider Black.
